name: Concierge Game
description:
This is a test version for Major Studio 2 Concierge Game.

In this version, Ann and I create a greybox testing, adding features of manus, chooisng characters, player movements and gestures, timer.

This game is under developing.

Level  Design: Zhijun& Ann

Coding: Zhijun

Character Design& Illustration: Ann

UI&Setting Design: Zhijun &Ann
